article.title: West Texas U.S. Export Assistance Center Contact Information
article.summary: Contact the West Texas U.S. Export Assistance Center.
article.content:
​​

Midland Office

Midland U.S. Export Assistance Center

1400 FM 1788 Room 1303
Midland, Texas 79707-1423
Phone: 432-552-2490
Fax: 432-552-3490
Email: harry.henson@trade.gov

Midland Staff

Harry Henson, Director

Phone: 432-552-2490
Fax: 432-552-3490
Email: harry.henson@trade.gov

Trade Information Center

1-800-USA-TRADE (1-800-872-8723). The Trade Information Center works in conjunction with your local office. For immediate export assistance or for answers to your technical questions on exporting, call M-F 8:30 am - 6:00 pm Eastern time.​

article.seometadatadescription: Contact the West Texas U.S. Export Assistance Center.
